author: mirichmo
body:
Reverts PowerShell/PowerShell#2738

The PR looks like it caused this packaging error:

``` powershell
Tests completed in 224.33s
Passed: 4244 Failed: 0 Skipped: 251 Pending: 116


VERBOSE: Packaging RID: 'ubuntu.14.04-x64'; Packaging Configuration: 'Linux'
VERBOSE: Packaging Source: 
'/home/travis/build/PowerShell/PowerShell/src/powershell-unix/bin/Linux/netcore
app1.1/ubuntu.14.04-x64/publish'
WARNING: -Type was not specified, continuing with deb!
WARNING: Building for Ubuntu 14.04!
WARNING: Suffix not given, building primary PowerShell package!
     roff: /home/travis/build/PowerShell/PowerShell/assets/powershell.1
Execution of { fpm $Arguments } failed with exit code 1
At /home/travis/build/PowerShell/PowerShell/build.psm1:2252 char:13
+             throw "Execution of {$sb} failed with exit code $LASTEXIT ...
+             ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : OperationStopped: (Execution of { ...ith exit co 
   de 1:String) [], RuntimeException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : Execution of { fpm $Arguments } failed with exit 
    code 1
```

I am reverting it to prevent blocking other PRs while we investigate it.
title: Revert "Initial Support for Fedora 24"
